Title: Burn Out
Plot: Grissom attempts to get a confession from a neighborhood pedophile by having him help in locating two missing boys.  The sex offender is the main suspect.  The investigation is more complex than the team ever thought it would be.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Paula Francis, Paul Ganus, Terry Bozeman, Palmer Davis, Glenn Taranto, Ingrid Oliu-Ostrom, Brittany Ishibashi, David Ramsey, Valerie Mikita, Clifton Powell, Drew Matthews, Seth Peterson, Ridge Canipe, Betsy Brand
